name: Loom of Doom
description:
This is a production project at Seattle AIE. This product is a hack and slash game where you're a vigilante fighting against the status quo. You can equip different weapons by scrolling with the mouse. Your goal is to destroy the looms that are spawning the enemies and advance to the next floor. 

Credits to Sabrina Clingenpeel, Sabrina Waller, Kevin Truong, Mikaela Flinders, Kevin Truong, and Will Halbert for the art assets.

Credits to James Lyle for making the level.
